title: eBay and Facebook told to tackle trade in fake reviews
text: Facebook and eBay have been warned by the UK’s Competition and Markets Authority (CMA) to do more to tackle the sale of fake reviews on their platforms. Fake reviews are illegal under UK consumer protection law.

text: Get it right and Libra could be the world's first truly global currency. Get it wrong, on the other hand, and there's risk of systematic financial collapse.

title: European central bankers claim oversight over Facebook’s cryptocurrency
text: Three European central bankers are claiming oversight over Facebook's planned virtual currency to ensure it will not jeopardize the financial system or be used to launder money.

title: Libra Will Expand Facebook's Kingdom Beyond Social Media
text: Libra will be a stable, independently managed cryptocurrency and targets a massive audience. Facebook will monetize with a digital wallet called Calibra. We expect rapid growth and wide adoption.

title: Facebook adds new limits to address the spread of hate speech in Sri Lanka and Myanmar
text: As Facebook grapples with the spread of hate speech on its platform, it is introducing changes that limit the spread of messages in two countries where it has come under fire in recent years: Sri Lanka and Myanmar. In a blog post on Thursday evening, Facebook said that it was “adding friction” to message forwarding […]

title: Central banks will want oversight of Facebook's Libra: Bank of England's Carney
text: Major central banks and regulators will want oversight of Facebook's proposed new currency and payment system, Libra, to ensure it is safe and does not allow money laundering or finance terrorism, Bank of England Governor Mark Carney said.

title: Bank of England keeps an 'open mind' on Facebook's cryptocurrency Libra
